snippet.title: HAY DAY POP (SUPERCELL) - Gameplay Walkthrough Part 1 iOS - Level 1, 2, 3
snippet.description:
HAY DAY POP (SUPERCELL) - Gameplay Walkthrough Part 1 iOS - Level 1, 2, 3

Hay Day Pop Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgPboZu40RjTJ8Z_BVY6u8IRKCILZVF3p

Let’s Pop!!! Puzzles, cute animals and relaxing vibes down on the farm of your dreams.

When life gives you puzzles, pop them! Solve challenging puzzles, grow bountiful crops and raise adorable animals down on the farm. From the creators of Hay Day comes Hay Day Pop.

Match and solve fun and challenging puzzles with never ending surprises. Reap the rewards and grow your own slice of paradise. Level up, expand and decorate your farm to make it into a home. Meet cute animals, amazing neighbors and pop your way up the leaderboards. Use your wits and boosters to keep your win streak alive. Earn star rewards and other awesome bonuses.

Let’s Pop!

Hay Day Pop features:

PUZZLES THAT GROW ON YOU
Solve thousands of fun, challenging puzzles with clever combos and explosive boosters. More challenges added every month

BOUNTIFUL WAYS TO WIN REWARDS
Pop puzzles, build your farm, harvest crops, and raise animals! Collect a variety of rewards and power ups every time you play

A TASTE OF THE FARM LIFE
A cornucopia of delightful decorations, perfect vegetable growing weather, pigs in saunas and friendly neighbors make this a special place

OUT POP YOUR FRIENDS
Play with friends and race them down Star River for bragging rights and awesome rewards

A WELCOMING PLACE
Visit your fellow farmers to check out their amazing farms and find hidden rewards. Invite your friends by for a star or two of their own

SEASONS YOU’LL LOVE
Fishing, Circus, Honey and more - no matter what season, you’ll be puzzling over new objectives and obstacles every month

FUN FOR EVERYONE
Puzzle levels range from easy to hard, so everyone can enjoy

OFFLINE ACCESS
Take your farm paradise to go. Play online or offline

Channel: https://www.youtube.com/igvgameplayreviews
Twitter: https://twitter.com/igvgaming
Facebook: https://facebook.com/igvgameplay
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/IGVGameplayreviews?sub_confirmation=1
Email: iosgameplayvideos@gmail.com

iTunes iOS Download link: https://apps.apple.com/nz/app/hay-day-pop/id1482597450?mt=8
Google Play Android Download link:
=================================================
